decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Planning Statement, dated September 2015; 1525/01-1, Sept 2015; 0143_11_RevA, dated 05-10-15; 1525/01-3, dated Sept 2015; 1525/01-2, dated Sept 2015; - received 14/10/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The radio studio hereby permitted shall not be open to visitors other than staff outside the hours of 09:00-18.30 Monday to Friday.

Condition : 4 - The sound insulation measures detailed in the approved drawings 0143_11_RevA, dated 05-10-15 and 1525/01-1, Sept 2015 shall be installed before the use hereby approved commences and shall be retained for the lifetime of the development.
description: Change of use of ground floor unit from training centre (Class D1) to radio studio (Class B1)
